T02D1238:105b-48: gyur pa'o // aom k'a ya badzr'atma k'a:sarba dharmma:k'a ya badzr'a tma ko& ham zhes brjod do //
T02D1238:105b-49: ngag gi lam du a'a:yig dmar po bsams nas de
T02D1238:105b-50: las gsung rdo rje'i tshogs kyis nam mkha' gang ba
T02D1238:105b-51: sa bon de nyid du zhugs pa las gsung rdo
T02D1238:106a-1: aom w'a ka badzr'atma k'a:sarba dha rmma:w'a ka badzr'a tma ko& ham zhes brjod do //
T02D1238:106a-2: snying gar h'um yig nag po bsams nas de las
T02D1238:106a-3: thugs rdo rje'i tshogs kyis nam mkha' gang ba sa
T02D1238:106a-4: bon de nyid du zhugs pa las thugs rdo rjer
T02D1238:106a-5: gyur pa'o // aom tsatti badzr'atma k'a:sarba dharmma shtsatti badzr'a tma ko& ham zhes brjod do //
T02D1238:106a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi le'ur yang gsungs pa /
T02D1238:106a-7: aom a'a:h'u% zhes pa sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags so zhes so //
T02D1238:106a-8: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D1238:106a-9: te 'di rnams kyi mthar thug pa ni dgod pa'o
T02D1238:106a-10: // bcom ldan 'das ma la ni dgod pa ji
T02D1238:106a-11: lta bur gyur pa de bzhin te rigs lnga'i cha
T02D1238:106a-13: sngar gsungs pa'i rim pas he ru ka'i rnam pa
T02D1238:106a-14: bzhi po rnams kyi nang nas rang gi 'dod pa'i
T02D1238:106a-15: lha shes rab dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1238:106a-16: sku mdog nag po 'jigs pa chen po zhe sdang
T02D1238:106a-17: gi bdag nyid can blta bar bya'o //
T02D1238:106a-18: sngar gsungs pa'i rim pa ni /
T02D1238:106a-19: sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i //
T02D1238:106a-20: dkyil 'khor dbang po bsgom par bya //
T02D1238:106a-22: de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas mtshan ma
T02D1238:106a-23: la sogs pa can bsams nas dam tshig gsum brtsal
T02D1238:106a-24: bar bya ste / de la bdag nyid dam tshig rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs nyid do //
T02D1238:106a-25: rang gi snying gar nyi ma la bdag nyid dam
T02D1238:106a-26: tshig pa bzhin du ye shes kyi dam tshig dang
T02D1238:106a-27: / de'i thugs kar ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig
T02D1238:106a-28: yi ge h'u% bsam par bya'o zhes pa zhe sdang
T02D1238:106a-30: de ltar dam tshig gsum gyi bdag nyid du gyur nas rigs lnga'i cha dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D1238:106a-31: shes rab rnyed nas mi g-yo zhing //
T02D1238:106a-32: sgrub po la gus mnyen gshin pa //
T02D1238:106a-33: sems can kun phan tshol ba can //
T02D1238:106a-34: mtshan rnams kun dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1238:106a-35: de'i mgo bor aom yig dang /
T02D1238:106a-39: rkang pa dag la h'a yig kyang dgod do //
T02D1238:106a-40: bcom ldan 'das ma'i yan lag dgong pa yang brjod par bya'o //
T02D1238:106a-41: gzugs phung rdo rje mar ni gyur //
T02D1238:106a-42: tshor ba la ni dkar mor dran //
T02D1238:106b-2: rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D1238:106b-3: bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnas so //
T02D1238:106b-4: sa ni pukka s'ir bshad do //
T02D1238:106b-5: chu khams ri khrod ma ru dran //
T02D1238:106b-6: me ni gtum mor shes par bya //
T02D1238:106b-7: rlung ni g-yung mor rab tu grags //
T02D1238:106b-8: gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu bshad //
T02D1238:106b-9: sgra la chom rkun ma rab grags //
T02D1238:106b-10: dri yi cha la ro langs ma //
T02D1238:106b-11: ro la ghasma r'i rab grags //
T02D1238:106b-12: reg las spyod mar bshad de //
T02D1238:106b-13: chos kyi khams la mkha' spyod ma /
T02D1238:106b-14: de ltar 'di rnams kyi sa bon yang dag par
T02D1238:106b-15: dgod par byas nas padma dang rdo rje'i byin gyis
T02D1238:106b-16: brlab par bya'o // aa:yig gis padma dga' ba sbyin
T02D1238:106b-17: par byed par bsams nas padma'i mdzod kyi ze'u 'bru'i
T02D1238:106b-18: bu gar h'u% yig rnam par bsam par bya /
T02D1238:106b-19: de'i rjes su h'u% yig las byung ba'i rdo rje
T02D1238:106b-20: bsgom par bya zhing de'i nor bu'i bu gar h'u%
T02D1238:106b-22: aom padma su kh'a dha ra ma h'a r'a ga sukhanda da /
T02D1238:106b-23: tsa tu r'a nanda bha ga bi shva h'u% h'u% karyam ku ru shva me /
T02D1238:106b-24: aom badzra ma h'a dve sha tsa tu r'a nanda
T02D1238:106b-25: d'a ya ka kha ga mu khee ga ra so
T02D1238:106b-26: n'a tha h'u% h'u% k'a ryam ku ru shva me
T02D1238:106b-27: zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1238:106b-28: phyi rol du phyag rgya med na yid kyis sprul
T02D1238:106b-29: pa'i phyag rgya rnyed nas de yang rigs lnga'i cha
T02D1238:106b-30: dang ldan pa'i rim pa dang po nyid du byas
T02D1238:106b-31: nas / rjes su chags pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1238:106b-32: aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga ta
T02D1238:106b-33: badzra sva bh'a w'atma k'a ssarbba dharmma: aom sarba ta
T02D1238:106b-34: th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga ta badzra sva bh'a
T02D1238:106b-35: w'atma ko& ham zhes byas nas /
T02D1238:106b-36: gsung rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis h'u% yig brjod de rdo rje g-yo bar bya'o //
T02D1238:106b-37: stong pa nyid du mos pa la sogs pa nas
T02D1238:106b-38: dga' ba'i bde ba'i mthar thug pa ni dang po
T02D1238:106b-39: sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D1238:106b-40: 'di yang shes rab dang thabs ro gcig pa'i bde
T02D1238:106b-41: ba chen po 'byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems phat
T02D1238:106b-42: yig gi rnam par spros par bsams nas mchod pa
T02D1238:106b-43: bya ste / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u
T02D1238:106b-44: dz'a badzra sva bh'a w'atma ka:sarba dharmm'a:aom sarba ta th'a
T02D1238:106b-45: ga ta p'u dz'a badzra sva bh'a w'atma ko& ham
T02D1238:106b-47: nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1238:106b-48: pas padma'i mdzod kyi nang du byang chub kyi sems
T02D1238:107a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje rnal
T02D1238:107a-3: 'byor ma'i rang bzhin gyis bdag nyid mchod par bya'o
T02D1238:107a-4: // gal te legs par bslabs par gyur pa'i phyag
T02D1238:107a-5: rgya med na ni mi bya ba kho na ste
T02D1238:107a-6: gzhan du na rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1238:107a-7: de'i rjes su byang chub kyi sems kyi rdul phra
T02D1238:107a-8: mo gang cung zad gnas pa de yongs su gyur
T02D1238:107a-9: pa las 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i rje btsun bsgom
T02D1238:107a-10: par bya ste bsrub par bya ba bsrub par bya
T02D1238:107a-22: zhes pa'i sngags 'di rnams kyis dbyung bar bya /
T02D1238:107a-23: phyung nas kyang 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing bkug nas
T02D1238:107a-24: de bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro'i lam
T02D1238:107a-25: nas zhugs pa las 'o ma dang chu ji lta
T02D1238:107a-26: ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1238:107a-28: bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcom ldan 'das ma yang ste /
T02D1238:107a-29: goo r'i la sogs pa rnams kyang rang rang gi
T02D1238:107a-30: gdan rnams su bsam par bya'o zhes pa ni dbyung
T02D1238:107a-31: ba'o // de la phyag bcu drug rnams ni stong pa nyid bcu drug rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1238:107a-32: g-yas kyi phyag brgyad na gnas pa'i padma'i snod brgyad
T02D1238:107a-33: rnams su go rims ji lta ba bzhin du glang
T02D1238:107a-48: nor sbyin rnams kyang g-yon gyi padma'i snod brgyad po rnams su rim pas shes par bya'o //
T02D1238:107a-49: glo dang de bzhin dbugs mi bde //
T02D1238:107a-50: smyo zad mdze dang rkang bam dang //
T02D1238:107a-51: mcher ba mchin pa'i rang bzhin gyis//
T02D1238:107a-52: thams cad 'di nyid rab tu grags //
T02D1238:107a-53: zhes pa nyon mongs pa brgyad rnam par dag pa
T02D1238:107a-54: las glang po che la sogs pa 'dzin pa rnams
T02D1238:107a-55: so // sa la sogs pa nas /
T02D1238:107a-56: nor sbyin gyi bar du ni dbang phyug brgyad rnam par dag pas so //
T02D1238:107b-0: sku yi dbang phyug gsung gi dbang phyug @107b dang ;
T02D1238:107b-1: / de bzhin kho nar thugs kyi dbang phyug kyang //
T02D1238:107b-2: rdzu 'phrul dang ni kun 'gro'i dbang phyug dang //
T02D1238:107b-3: 'dod dang byed po yon tan brgyad pa'o //
T02D1238:107b-4: sku mtha' yas pa ni sku'i dbang phyug go //
T02D1238:107b-5: thams cad kyi skad du smra ba ni gsung gi dbang phyug go //
T02D1238:107b-6: sems can thams cad kyi sems shes pa ni thugs kyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1238:107b-7: rdzu 'phrul gyis mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1238:107b-8: 'jig rten gsum po gcig pa'i sku ni kun du 'gro ba'i dbang phyug go //
T02D1238:107b-9: a'atstshi'i sgras ni 'dod pa gsungs te /
T02D1238:107b-10: 'dod pas sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po
T02D1238:107b-11: skyed par byed pa ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug go
T02D1238:107b-12: // byed pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes byed po'i dbang phyug go //
T02D1238:107b-13: lha'i rnam pas spyod pa ni yon tan gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1238:107b-14: padma'i snod ni snying rje'i cha rnam par dag pa las yin la /
T02D1238:107b-15: phyag rnams ni stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa las te /
T02D1238:107b-16: 'dis ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa nyid du rig par byas so //
T02D1238:107b-17: byams pa'i thugs las yan lag gnag /
T02D1238:107b-18: zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad //
T02D1238:107b-19: rnam par dag pa las te /
T02D1238:107b-20: sdang ba sgrub par byed pa'i don du zhal dang po ni nag po'o //
T02D1238:107b-21: dbang gi don du g-yon pa dmar po'o//
T02D1238:107b-22: g-yas kyi dkar po ni zhi ba sgrub pa'o //
T02D1238:107b-23: zhe sdang la sogs pa byung ba rnam par nyams
T02D1238:107b-24: pa'i don du steng gi zhal ni rnam par gtsigs
T02D1238:107b-26: bdud bzhi rnam par gzhom pa'i don du slar g-yas g-yon gyi zhal gnyis gnyis nag po ste /
T02D1238:107b-27: zhal thams cad nyid mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D1238:107b-28: 'khyog po'i smin ma dang bcas pa //
T02D1238:107b-30: 'khrug pa'i 'od can 'jigs pa chen po ste //
T02D1238:107b-31: khro bo bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1238:107b-32: zhal so sor dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan gsum ste snying rje las ni dmar po nyid do //
T02D1238:107b-33: rdo rje gsum gyi spyan gsum gyis /
T02D1238:107b-34: dus gsum yongs su shes pa las ni spyan gsum nyid do //
T02D1238:107b-35: de ltar nyi shu rtsa bzhis byug pa'o //
T02D1238:107b-36: dar dpyang bcings shing gyen du brdzes pa'i skra ni
T02D1238:107b-37: ser skya ste 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs
T02D1238:107b-38: pa ma lus pa sreg par byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D1238:108a-1: ba'i don byed pa'i phyir spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
T02D1238:108a-2: phung po lnga po rnams kyi rang bzhin med pa
T02D1238:108a-3: nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir du dpral ba'i steng
T02D1238:108a-4: du mgo bo skam po lnga'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o
T02D1238:108a-5: // de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnam par dag pa las 'khor lo dang rna rgyan dang /
T02D1238:108a-7: ska rags te phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1238:108a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par dag pa las thal
T02D1238:108a-9: ba yang ngo zhes pa phyag rgya drug tu rab
T02D1238:108a-10: tu grags so // chos thams cad la dmigs pa
T02D1238:108a-11: med pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir du yang dag
T02D1238:108a-12: par rdzogs pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa las
T02D1238:108a-13: tu grags so // gcer bu'o // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis zhabs bzhi'o //
T02D1238:108a-14: byang chub kyi sems shin tu thob pa'i phyir nyi
T02D1238:108a-15: ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhabs gnyis kyis skyil krung phyed
T02D1238:108a-16: pa t'a na da pa'i stabs 'chang ba nyid do
T02D1238:108a-17: // 'di nyid khams gsum po ma lus pa gcig
T02D1238:108a-18: pa'i skur rtogs par bya ba'i phyir zhabs kyi mthe
T02D1238:108a-20: de lta bu kho nar bgegs rnam par nyams pa las g-yon bskum pa'i zhabs 'chang ba'o //
T02D1238:108a-21: a'a li k'a li'i yi ge rnam par dag pa
T02D1238:108a-22: las yi ge lnga bcus bkra ba khrag rab tu
T02D1238:108a-23: 'dzag pa'i mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba phrag pa
T02D1238:108a-24: la bkod pa ste zung du 'jug pa'i lam nye
T02D1238:108a-25: bar bstan pas na mgo bo'i phreng ba phrag pa
T02D1238:108a-26: la'o // sgeg pa dpa' ba mi sdug pa //
T02D1238:108a-27: drag shul rgod dang 'jigs su rung //
T02D1238:108a-28: snying rje ngo mtshar zhi rnams kyis //
T02D1238:108a-29: gar gyi ro dgu ldan pa nyid //
T02D1238:108a-31: de la bdag med ma dang lhan cig ro gcig pa nyid ni sgeg pa'o //
T02D1238:108a-32: dur khrod na bzhugs pa ni dpa' ba'o //
T02D1238:108a-33: khro gnyer gtsigs pa nyid ni mi sdug pa'o //
T02D1238:108a-34: 'bar ba'i 'od nyid ni drag shul lo //
T02D1238:108a-35: zhal rnam par rgyas pa nyid ni rgod pa'o //
T02D1238:108a-36: mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba nyid ni 'jigs su rung ba'o //
T02D1238:108a-37: sems can rjes su 'dzin pas sems nyid ni snying rje'o //
T02D1238:108a-38: sgyu ma'i gzugs nyid ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02D1238:108a-39: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa
T02D1238:108a-40: nyid ni zhi ba ste de rnams dang ldan pa'o
T02D1238:108a-41: // brgyad gnyis kyi lo'i rnam pas rol pa'i sku
T02D1238:108b-0: bdag med ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i bcom @108b
T02D1238:108b-1: ldan 'das su bdag nyid blta bar bya'o //
T02D1238:108b-2: bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba ltar bcom ldan 'das
T02D1238:108b-3: ma yang ste 'on kyang phyag lnga lnga dang ldan
T02D1238:108b-4: pa'i mi mgo skam po'i phreng bas brgyan pa'i sku
T02D1238:108b-5: lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis gang ba'i
T02D1238:108b-6: thod pa phyag g-yon na 'dzin pa nyon mongs pa
T02D1238:108b-7: ma lus pa gcod pa'i phyir gri gug 'dzin pa'o
T02D1238:108b-8: // khams gsum pa gcig pa'i ngor gtogs par bya ba'i phyir du zhal gcig ma /
T02D1238:108b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi smad kyi ro yang dag par myang bar byed pa /
T02D1238:108b-10: zhabs g-yon brkyang bas mchog tu bde ba chen po'i
T02D1238:108b-11: dga' bas bcom ldan 'das dang snyoms par zhugs par
T02D1238:108b-12: bsam par bya'o // pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T02D1238:108b-13: rnam par dag pas kye rdo rje phyag drug pa
T02D1238:108b-14: ste zhal gsum pa rtsa ba'i zhal nag po //
T02D1238:108b-16: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis dag gis rtse gsum dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02D1238:108b-17: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis dag gis rdo rje dang gri gug 'dzin pa /
T02D1238:108b-18: phyag lhag ma dag gis gri gug dang thod par
T02D1238:108b-19: bcas pas rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la snyoms par
T02D1238:108b-20: zhugs pa ro mnan pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D1238:108b-21: yang bdud bzhi rnam par dag pa las kye'i rdo
T02D1238:108b-22: rje phyag bzhi pa ste g-yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1238:108b-23: pa g-yon gyis thod khrag / phyag lhag ma dag
T02D1238:108b-24: gis rdo rje phag mo la snyoms par zhugs pa
T02D1238:108b-25: / zhal gcig pa ro mnan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1238:108b-26: yang kye rdo rje phyag gnyis pa ni g-yon gyis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga /
T02D1238:108b-27: g-yas kyis 'bar ba'i rdo rje ro mnan pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D1238:108b-28: phyag drug pa la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi shes rab ma ni rdo rje ma ste /
T02D1238:108b-29: lhag ma ni phyag bcu drug pa bzhin te sku
T02D1238:108b-30: mdog dang rgyan la sogs pa dang h'u% las byung
T02D1238:108b-31: ba la sogs pa'i gzugs su blta bar bya'o //
T02D1238:108b-32: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la sogs
T02D1238:108b-33: pa rnams kyi yang bdag med ma bzhin te ming
T02D1238:108b-35: thams cad kha tv'am gal 'khyud pas gnas pa ni thams cad kyi yin par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1238:108b-36: de ltar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das rang gi 'dod
T02D1238:108b-37: pa'i lha'i rnam par bsams nas bsrub cing bsrub pa'i
T02D1238:108b-38: sbyor ba las lha mo'i 'khor lo gang yin pa
T02D1238:109a-2: de la shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang sku mdog
T02D1238:109a-3: dang mtshan ma la sogs pa'i rim pa ni rnam
T02D1238:109a-4: par dag pa'i sgo nas rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1238:109a-5: de la shar gyi sgor gdul bya bdud kyi sems
T02D1238:109a-6: can sad par bya ba'i ga% yig las skyes pa'i
T02D1238:109a-8: log par lta ba gcod par byed pa'i phyir g-yas kyi phyag na gri gug 'dzin pa /
T02D1238:109a-9: 'khor ba'i bag chags nyams par bya ba'i phyir g-yon pas nya ro hi ta 'dzin pa /
T02D1238:109a-11: gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1238:109a-12: lhor gdul bya 'dod chags kyi sems can sad par
T02D1238:109a-13: bya ba'i phyir tsam yig las chom rkun ma sku
T02D1238:109a-14: mdog dmar mo'o // shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag
T02D1238:109a-15: nyid can rtogs par bya ba'i phyir g-yas na cang
T02D1238:109a-16: mdog dmar mo'o // te'u 'dzin pa / gti mug
T02D1238:109a-17: gzhom pa'i don du g-yon na phag pa 'dzin pa
T02D1238:109a-18: mdog dmar mo'o // te'u 'dzin pa / / brgya
T02D1238:109a-19: byin mnan pa tshor ba'i phung po'i rang bzhin du
T02D1238:109a-20: mdog dmar mo'o // te'u 'dzin pa / / blta

T02D1238:125a-33: rmongs pa gang gis bdag mi shes //
T02D1238:125a-34: rje btsun lha mo'i bha gar ni //
T02D1238:125a-35: ae yi rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs //
T02D1238:125a-36: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / bde ba can du rtag tu rgyu //
T02D1238:125a-37: 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga //
T02D1238:125a-38: rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga //
T02D1238:125a-39: bsgrub bya 'gro ba'i ston pa nga //
T02D1238:125a-41: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga //
T02D1238:125a-42: mchog mtha' dga' bral dad po can //
T02D1238:125a-43: mun pa la ni mar me ltar //
T02D1238:125a-44: de bzhin bus kyang yid ches gyis //
T02D1238:125a-45: ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T02D1238:125a-46: btsun mo'i bha ga bde can du //
T02D1238:125a-47: khu ba'i ming gis rnam par gnas //
T02D1238:125a-48: gsungs pa'i rim pa 'di gnyis kyis //
T02D1238:125a-49: sngags rgyud sogs dang rnal 'byor la //
T02D1238:125a-50: gang gis he ru ka mi shes //
T02D1238:125a-51: de yis log par ngal ba'o //
T02D1238:125a-52: de med pas na bde med 'gyur //
T02D1238:125a-53: bde ba med na de med 'gyur //
T02D1238:125a-54: nus med nyid phyir ltos bcas te //
T02D1238:125b-1: gang phyir lus las byung bas na //
T02D1238:125b-2: lha zhes brjod par bya ba yin //
T02D1238:125b-3: de phyir sangs rgyas dngos 'gyur min //
T02D1238:125b-4: dngos med tshul du'ang 'gyur nyid min //
T02D1238:125b-5: zhal phyag rnam pa gzugs can te /
T02D1238:125b-6: mchog tu bde bas gzugs med pa //
T02D1238:125b-7: de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes //
T02D1238:125b-8: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes brjod bya //
T02D1238:125b-9: rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1238:125b-10: rang bzhin nyid ni mya ngan 'das //
T02D1238:125b-11: bzhin lag kha dog dbyibs las ni //
T02D1238:125b-12: lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs su ni //
T02D1238:125b-13: skye ba tsam gyis rnam par gnas //
T02D1238:125b-14: 'on kyang tha mal bag chags las //
T02D1238:125b-15: de'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lus med pas grol ba ma yin te /
T02D1238:125b-16: de ni gang du yang 'dod par bya ba ma yin no //
T02D1238:125b-17: thams cad du stong pa nyid las lhan cig skyes
T02D1238:125b-18: pa bshad pa dngos pos grol ba de yang ma
T02D1238:125b-19: yin no // de'i phyir yang de dag gi rnam par grol ba ni stong pa nyid dang /
T02D1238:125b-20: snying rje dbyer med pa'i mthar thug pa'i gzugs byang
T02D1238:125b-21: chub kyi sems ma yin no zhes bya bar nges
T02D1238:125b-22: so // de ltar yang klu sgrub zhabs kyis //
T02D1238:125b-23: dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol bya //
T02D1238:125b-24: dngos po med pas 'gyur ba min //
T02D1238:125b-25: dngos po'i bdag nyid rnam grol te //
T02D1238:125b-26: dngos dang dngos med yongs shes pas //
T02D1238:125b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rgyud du gsungs pa //
T02D1238:125b-28: rdo rje snying po snying rje che //
T02D1238:125b-29: dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing //
T02D1238:125b-31: de yongs shes pas grol ba yin //
T02D1238:125b-32: dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas //
T02D1238:125b-33: dngos po bsgom 'gyur shes rab can //
T02D1238:125b-34: dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas //
T02D1238:125b-35: he ru ka dpal de ltar bsgom //
T02D1238:125b-37: shr'i yig gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1238:125b-38: de ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02D1238:125b-39: ru yig bkod pa dang bral ba //
T02D1238:125b-40: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1238:125b-41: de ltar shes nas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1238:125b-42: gang zhig mnyam gzhag sgom byed pa //
T02D1238:125b-43: bsod nams zhan pa'i mi yis kyang //
T02D1238:125b-44: the tshom med par de 'grub po //
T02D1238:125b-45: mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor yang rnal 'byor tha ma'i'o //
T02D1238:125b-46: bza' dang btung dang khrus byed dang //
T02D1238:125b-47: sad dam nyams yang bsam par bya //
T02D1238:125b-48: phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas //
T02D1238:126a-1: par gzhag pa 'di ni rnal 'byor ma 'bring po'i yin no //
T02D1238:126a-2: chen po'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis //
T02D1238:126a-3: bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang //
T02D1238:126a-4: bgrod dang bgrod min mi spang zhing //
T02D1238:126a-5: khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste //
T02D1238:126a-6: grong gi chos ni spang mi bya //
T02D1238:126a-7: blo ldan sngags bzla ba nyid min //
T02D1238:126a-8: bsam gtan dmigs par bya nyid min //
T02D1238:126a-9: gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste //
T02D1238:126a-10: dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go //
T02D1238:126a-11: ba la thams cad bza' bar bya //
T02D1238:126a-12: rigs rnams la ni mnyam par spyad //
T02D1238:126a-13: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1238:126a-14: btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya //
T02D1238:126a-15: grogs la dga' bar mi bya zhing ;
T02D1238:126a-16: / de bzhin gdug la zhe sdang min //
T02D1238:126a-17: rdo shing sa las byung ba yi //
T02D1238:126a-18: lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya //
T02D1238:126a-19: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par ro //
T02D1238:126a-21: sngags kyi bzlas med dka' thub med cing sbyin sreg med //
T02D1238:126a-22: dkyil 'khor ba med dkyil 'khor yang ni med pa ste //
T02D1238:126a-23: de ni sngags bzlas dka' thub de yin sbyin sreg de //
T02D1238:126a-24: de ni dkyil 'khor pa ste dkyil 'khor yang ni de //
T02D1238:126a-25: mdor bsdus nas ni sems su 'dus pa'i gzugs can no //
T02D1238:126a-27: ji ltar dpa' bo rtog med pas //
T02D1238:126a-28: 'jig rten pa yi gnas bcom nas //
T02D1238:126a-29: spyod pa thams cad spyad par bya //
T02D1238:126a-30: de tshe de yis sangs rgyas mthong //
T02D1238:126a-32: dpal ldan he ru ka yis rgyud kyi rgyal por gsungs pa'i bla med rim pa lnga //
T02D1238:126a-33: dpal ldan dz'a lan dha ri bzang po'i zhabs kyis bkod dang bla ma'i gsang ba'i bzhed //
T02D1238:126a-34: de thob skal pa bzang la yang dag gzhung byas bsod nams mchog gang thob de la //
T02D1238:126a-35: ma lus sems can phung po'i 'gro bas bla med rim lnga nges par thob par shog //
T02D1238:126a-36: dpal kye rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs rab tu gsal
T02D1238:126a-37: ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon
T02D1238:126a-38: dpal sgra gcan gsang ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D1238:126a-39: so; ; //'di ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi
T02D1238:126a-40: dpal la brten nas dzam bus mtshan pa'i gling gi
T02D1238:126a-41: byang phyogs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po'i srid la mnga'
T02D1238:126a-42: so; ; bsgyur zhing / bstan pa rin po che la sri zhu dang /
T02D1238:126a-43: bya ba lhag par bsgrub pa'i khur gyis mi ngal ba'i chos kyi rgyal po chen po//
T02D1238:126b-0: @126b grags pa 'byung gnas rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos lung stsal zhing /
